page.title: 16L'ton Harbour Today
page.content: The Littlehampton Harbour today is an area of increased development with a large new industrial estate being built on its banks.The traditional industries of boat-building are still present although these are now confined to modern yachts made of fibre glass. The harbour is visited by many large vessels such as the Chichester City and Star that bring in vast quantities of ballast used in the constuction of roads etc.It is a thriving industrial area employing many local people. The new industries include Lifeboat building,timber merchants,electronics and small engineering industries. There is an important tourist industry centered in and around the harbour which includes a modern Marina and large floating restaurant.
